body_html:
I am confused. Are you using cuda 9 or 9.1? In the original post you posted LD_LIBRARY_PATH as


> and the LD_LIBRARY_PATH:
> 
> /home/bafhf/cuda-9.1/lib64:/home/bafhf/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:

You can get a stacktrace by running your python file using gdb.

  1. gdb python
  2. run file.py
  3. bt

body:
I am confused. Are you using cuda 9 or 9.1? In the original post you posted LD_LIBRARY_PATH as 

```

> and the LD_LIBRARY_PATH:
> 
> /home/bafhf/cuda-9.1/lib64:/home/bafhf/cuda-9.1/extras/CUPTI/lib64:

```

You can get a stacktrace by running your python file using gdb. 

1. gdb python
2. run file.py
3. bt
